items.sentence: I was woken up by the buzzing of a bumblebee.
I have three times as many books as you have.
I applied for the job that Tom told me about.
Do you think that Tom will tell me the truth?
Those who live by the sword die by the sword.
The castle is on the other side of the river.
The flowers in the garden are very beautiful.
Tomorrow, I'll take the books to the library.
The cook prepares different dishes every day.
There's no space in the room for another bed.
